word: H2441 - חֵךְ - chêk - khake - Mouth - வாய்

sections.paragraph: the mouth, the palate, taste, the gums
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Probably from H2496 in the sense of tasting; properly the palate or inside of the mouth; hence the mouth itself (as the organ of speech, taste and kissing): - (roof of the) mouth, taste.
